result.execSummary:
The defendant Dean M Sutcliffe was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 1st-Degree Intentional Homicide, a class A felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.01(1)(a).
  • 1st-Degree Intentional Homicide, a class A felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.01(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: DA has 90 days to prepare/submit order.

$250 DNA surcharge remitted. $268  to be collected by the Dept of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.  The balance remaining at release from prison be paid as a condition of extended supervision or parole at a rate determined by the supervising agent.
Maintain full-time employment/education or combination of or be seeking same, and treatment.
Defendant not to use or possess any weapon.
Defendant shall not have any contact of any type with vicim's families unless requested by any of them.
Def to take all prescribed medications.  Any other conditions DOC, Probation/Parole Department may impose.

supervisions.notes: Def eligible for Parole/ES on February 9, 2040.

superMiscConds.notes: $268  to be collected by the Dept of Corrections.
All other conditions are the same as count 1.
